name: R-MAT
description: R-MAT is a next-generation foam that surpasses EVA in cushioning, traction, and durability, offering superior comfort, energy return, and long-lasting performance for midsoles, outsoles, and sock liners.

features.title: Superior Cushioning
features.subtitle: Enhanced comfort with lower compression set and higher resilience than EVA.

features.title: Exceptional Traction
features.subtitle: Delivers better grip with higher static and kinetic friction indexes for improved stability.

features.title: Long-Lasting Durability
features.subtitle: Maintains cushioning and energy return far beyond the lifespan of traditional EVA materials.

specs.name: Coefficient of Friction (Static/Kinetic on Varnished Wood - Dry)

shortdescription: Next-generation foam with superior cushioning, traction, and durability.
